transcription.text: Magic lantern slides made up of printed coloured images on round pices of glass mounted in a rectangular wood frame with a glue/resin. Frame has printed green label attached on one end noting 'Patent Enamel Slides for the Magic Lantern, J Barnard & Son, Maker, London, Jack The Giant Killer. #', the other end of slide has embossed text noting 'B&S PATENT'.

work.title: Jack the Giant Killer lantern slides
